BenukiSafaris.overview: Accommodation & Meals   Additional accommodation before and at the end of the tour can be arranged for an extra cost   Day Accommodation Meals   1       The Ark     Mid-range lodge inside Aberdare NP     Lunch & Dinner Included                   +8 Photos          +7 Photos              Lunch & Dinner Included       2      Flamingo Hill Camp      Mid-range tented camp inside Lake Nakuru NP     All Meals Included                   +6 Photos          +5 Photos              All Meals Included       3-4       Zebra Plains Mara Camp     Mid-range tented camp inside Masai Mara NR     All Meals Included                   +12 Photos          +11 Photos              All Meals Included       5      End of tour(No accommodation)      Breakfast & Lunch Included           Breakfast & Lunch Included

BenukiSafaris.inclusions: Excluded  International flights (From/to home) Additional accommodation before and at the end of the tour Tips (Tipping guideline US$10.00 pp per day) Personal items (Souvenirs, travel insurance, visa fees, etc.) Government imposed increase of taxes and/or park fees
BenukiSafaris.gettingthere: Getting There         This tour starts and ends in Nairobi          Book your own international flights when using this operator help          Fly to/from Jomo Kenyatta Airport (NBO- Check price) in Nairobi          A transfer from and back to the airport is included          Additional accommodation before and at the end of the tour can be arranged for an extra cost
